scripts.genDbTypes: read -p 'Password: ' -s pwd && PGHOST=localhost PGPORT=5432 PGUSER=WEB_APP_DB_NAME PGPASSWORD=$pwd PGDATABASE=WEB_APP_DB_NAME node generateDbTypes.js
scripts.migrateDb: read -p 'Password: ' -s pwd && PGHOST=localhost PGPORT=5432 PGUSER=WEB_APP_DB_NAME PGPASSWORD=$pwd PGDATABASE=WEB_APP_DB_NAME knex migrate:latest
scripts.rollbackDb: read -p 'Password: ' -s pwd && PGHOST=localhost PGPORT=5432 PGUSER=WEB_APP_DB_NAME PGPASSWORD=$pwd PGDATABASE=WEB_APP_DB_NAME knex migrate:rollback
scripts.createMigration: read -p 'Migration name: ' name && knex migrate:make $name -x ts
